lines.name: Locke
lines.text: This shadowy city. Some think that it’s a quiet sunny paradise, but I’ve roamed these streets long enough to know better.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: The brightest light casts the darkest shadows, and this place is no different. Just out of sight, there’s a hazy world of crime that escapes the law.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: It’s not perfect, but it’s home.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: And I’m the only one that can drag the criminals into the light. It’s my burden to bear, my-

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Hey Locke! ...Are you talking to yourself again?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Ack! No it was just practice! A pep talk!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Wait, I didn't hear a knock- how did you get in here?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Locke, you always forget to lock the door. Anyways, what are you up to?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh, y'know, just the usual... Lotta detective work going on.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Is that why it was so dark in here?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Uhhhhh yeah. Yeah, that's why. I'm trying out this new thing, seeing if it'll help me focus.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Huh. Well, I was in the area, so I thought I'd stop by!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Oh, did you finish early today?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Yup. My client's writing was already pretty polished, so they didn't need too much feedback.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: But get this, the book's going to be about these anthropomorphic trains with faces!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Isn't that already-

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Anthropomorphic trains that combine into one giant robot and fight their arch nemesis, the C.A.R.- Wait, I shouldn't run around dropping spoilers.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Anyways, are you busy? I was going to ask if you wanted to hang out.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well with a detective agency as prominent as mine, I USUALLY am...

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Today's just a rare exception. So I GUESS I can close up early-
*Knock knock.*

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Hold that thought. I'm going to grab that door. Hello!

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Oh excuse me, is this Enloade's Detective Agency?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Why yes, that's me! Enloade. Locke Enloade, please to make your acquaintance, ma'am.

lines.name: Client
lines.text: Oh it's very nice to meet you, dearie. I'm Allie Catt.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: I don't mean to be brusk, but I was wondering if you could help me out with something.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: You see, Admiral Snugglez has gone missing, and I just don't know where to find her! I've checked everywhere that I could think of, but I've had no luck at all.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: I thought that maybe a detective like you could, I don't know, track her down or something!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Is that... your cat? Why is she in the military?

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: Oh she was just the sweetest little thing. I don't know how she could have ran away.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: (She avoided my question!)

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Well then, if you'll excuse me for just a moment, I need to confer with my associate over here. That's you, Tai.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Wha- me? Err, okay.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Geez, a missing cat?! I was hoping for something a little more...

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: More?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: More admirable!

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Well, it's only two letters off from the cat's name really.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Listen, if I'm gonna take this over hanging out, then the least that fate can do is give me a case that's actually detective-y.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: But it's just another cat-fest like usual. I'm not even sure this could be considered a case.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Aw, cheer up Locke! I don't mind hanging out some other day.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Case or no, it's still a mystery! Kinda.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Kinda?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: If you squint and turn your head sideways. Think of it as uhh... stepping stones... on the way to... greater detective-hood?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You mean like grinding for higher power levels?

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: Yeah that!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: You know what, you're right. A true detective pursues justice on all the avenues. For the good of the kitty- uh, I mean city.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: That's the spirit!

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: *Ahem* Sorry to keep you waiting. After some careful consideration, I have decided that I will take your case.

lines.name: Allie Catt
lines.text: Oh thank you so much, Detective!
